jp_text:
（長門）今の…
（キョン）ああ 朝比奈さんの声だ

en_text: Something may have happened to her.
jp_text: 何かあったかもしれない　急ぐぞ！

en_text: Are you okay!?
jp_text: （長門）えっ!?

en_text: That's...
jp_text: （長門）これ…

en_text: They're fireflies.
jp_text: （ハルヒ）蛍よ

en_text: This pond's famous for its fireflies.
jp_text: この池は蛍の名所なのさ
google_translated: This pond is a landmark of fireflies

en_text: But there were no ghosts,\Nno monsters, no UMAs...
jp_text: 未知との遭遇は何もなかったわね
google_translated: There was nothing encounter with unknown

en_text: Indeed. It's most unfortunate.
jp_text:
（ハルヒ）
あ～あ せっかくの肝試し―
google_translated: Oh, I'm going to try it.

en_text: Which means, the thing she saw\Nlast year, and said you "set up", was...
jp_text:
朝比奈さんが“出た”って
言ったのは…

en_text: I thought it was funny,\Nso until Mikuru realized it herself,
jp_text:
本当は蛍だって
みくる自身が気づくまで―
google_translated:
It is really fireflies
Until Mikuru I notice-

en_text: But, it's her fault for\Nnot realizing the truth.
jp_text:
まあねえ
でも気づかないほうも悪いにょろよ
google_translated:
Hey
But I can not notice it

en_text: Don't say things like that,\Njust fill her in already.
jp_text:
そんなこと言ってないで
早く教えてあげてくださいよ
google_translated:
Don't say that
Please tell me early

en_text: What are you grinning about?
jp_text:
（キョン）
何ですか？　にやにやして

en_text: I'll keep quiet about this\None until you realize, too.
jp_text: これも気づくまで黙ってるっさ

en_text: Huh...
jp_text: はあ…

en_text: Next time: "Fireworks"
jp_text: （長門）次回…
